title: App1
description: This individual examination project for the course Web Applications for Mobile Devices focused on responsive design. The application provides users with real-time information about train delays within Sweden, utilizing data accessed through the Swedish Transportation Administration's (Trafikverket) API. Developed as a single-page application, the project was built using JavaScript and NodeJS with Express.
